name: Lumentica
tag_list: it, open-source, linux, consulting, cloud, hosting, development
overview:
Lumentica, LLC is an information technology services company developing and providing cloud computing technologies (SaaS and PaaS) and other products and services to individuals and organizations. We at Lumentica are currently focused on leveraging our competencies in open-source technologies to provide robust, cost-effective open-source based distributed application hosting services to individuals and organizations deploying applications in the cloud.

Lumentica is committed to facilitating the adoption of superior open-source technologies by individuals and enterprises throughout the world. To this end, Lumentica provides consulting and other services to a broad range of clients and customers, with unparalleled service and responsiveness. Headquartered in Indianapolis, Indiana, USA, Lumentica is securely situated to provide IT services to its clients and customers in more than 100 countries.
